disclaimer.title: LINKO: Demo App
disclaimer.subtitle: ⚠️ Experimental Technology Playground
disclaimer.content1: LINKO is an experimental demonstration platform under active development. All features are provided "as is" without any warranties. The platform may experience technical issues, functionality changes, or data loss at any time. This demo is intended solely for testing peer-to-peer connectivity and decentralized data sharing concepts.
disclaimer.content2: Your account security relies entirely on cryptographic keypairs generated and stored on your device. LINKO developers do not have access to, control over, or ability to recover any keypairs, encrypted data, or user content. By using this demo, you acknowledge and accept full responsibility for managing your keypairs and any associated risks.
disclaimer.content3: All content shared through this demo is public, unmoderated, and transmitted directly between connected peers. LINKO developers are not responsible for and have no control over user-generated content, relay server operations, or peer interactions. This software is provided under the MIT license, and its developers explicitly disclaim any liability for how others may use or misuse this technology.

what.title: What is LINKO?
what.description: LINKO is a decentralized, privacy-focused link-in-bio platform built on GunDB. Unlike traditional platforms, LINKO gives you complete control over your data through peer-to-peer technology. Create beautiful, customizable pages without relying on centralized servers.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.description: Your data is stored across a peer-to-peer network, not on centralized servers. You own your content.

authenticated.title: User Authentication
authenticated.description: Secure user authentication and account management using SEA (Security, Encryption, Authorization) technology.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: No tracking, no analytics, no data collection. Your privacy is our priority.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Fully open source and transparent. Inspect, modify, and contribute to the code.

license.title: License
license.description: LINKO is released under the MIT License. You are free to use, modify, and distribute this software. This is experimental technology provided "as is" without warranties. Use at your own risk.
